com.centrify.cloud.saas
Class SamlResponseValidator

java.lang.Object
  com.centrify.cloud.saas.SamlResponseValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISamlResponseValidator
public class SamlResponseValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISamlResponseValidator

A class that validates a SAML response.

This class validates a SAML response in XML or Base64encoded XML format. This class supports both SAML 1 and SAML 2 protocols.

This class is an implementation of the ISamlResponseValidator interface. You can use the CentrifySamlFactory.getResponseValidator() method to return an ISamlResponseValidator object.

See Also:
CentrifySamlFactory.getResponseValidator()

Constructor Detail

SamlResponseValidator

public SamlResponseValidator(java.security.PublicKey idpPublicKey,
                             java.lang.String idpIssuerName,
                             java.lang.String audience)
Creates a new SamlResponseValidator object.

Parameters:
idpPublicKey - The public key from the identity provider (IdP).
idpIssuerName - The identify provider issuer name.
audience - The URI of the audience to which the response is addressed. The audience is in the SAML assertion script in the Advanced tab for the application in Centrify Cloud Manager.
Method Detail

processSamlResponse

public SamlResponse processSamlResponse(java.lang.String samlResponse)
                                 throws ValidationException,
                                        StatusException,
                                        CentrifySaasException
Description copied from interface: ISamlResponseValidator
Validates a SAML authentication response that is in Base64-encoded XML format.

Specified by:
processSamlResponse in interface ISamlResponseValidator
Parameters:
samlResponse - The Base64-encoded SAML response you want to validate.
Returns:
A validated SAML response.
Throws:
InvalidSignatureException - The digital signature was not valid, indicating the response was counterfeit or corrupted.
InvalidConditionException - A specified condition was not met.
ValidationException - An error occurred while validating the response.
StatusException - The response's status is not SUCCESS.
InvalidSamlFormatException - The response does not conform to the SAML schema.
CentrifySaasException - An error occurred in the Centrify code. Catch the exception for an explanation.
